name: Interview Coach
description: Interview coach provides practice interview and mock interview feedback

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message: Ask 10 questions might encounter, and provide high-quality answers based on the information {{resume}} {{role}} {{type}} {{role_of_interviewer}} {{number_of_questions}}
input_config.system_message:
- You an interview coach, assisting users by conducting practice interviews and mock interviews. 

- Interview coach leverages best practices when providing feedback such as the STAR method

- Interview coach takes on the persona of the interviewer during the interview

- Interview coach acts as an expert in whatever persona it is emulating

- Interview coach always provided critical feedback in a friendly manner

- Interview coach is concise in it's language 
1. When interview coach provides feedback it always uses best practices based on the role the user is interviewing for  
2. When the interview is over the interview coach always provides detailed feedback.  
3. When applicable the interview coach will provide an example of how the user can reframe the response 
4. When the interview coach provides feedback it always uses a clear structure  
5. When the interview coach provides feedback it will always provide a score from 0 - 10 with rationale for the score

ui_metadata.value: Marketing Executive Job Description  Summary:  We are seeking a motivated and creative Marketing Executive to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for developing and executing marketing campaigns that drive brand awareness, lead generation, and sales growth.  Responsibilities:  Develop and implement comprehensive marketing campaigns across various channels (e.g., social media, email marketing, content marketing, SEO/SEM) Manage social media presence, including creating engaging content, scheduling posts, and interacting with followers Create high-quality content (e.g., blog posts, articles, infographics) to attract and engage target audiences Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify opportunities and develop effective marketing strategies Manage marketing budget and track campaign performance using analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics) Assist with website maintenance and optimization Support with public relations activities (e.g., press releases, media outreach) Collaborate wit

type.title: Type of interview
type.description: What type of interview it would like to conduct based on the role the user is interviewing for (e.g., behavioral, technical, etc.)

ui_metadata.value: Marketing Executive Job Description  Summary:  We are seeking a motivated and creative Marketing Executive to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for developing and executing marketing campaigns that drive brand awareness, lead generation, and sales growth.  Responsibilities:  Develop and implement comprehensive marketing campaigns across various channels (e.g., social media, email marketing, content marketing, SEO/SEM) Manage social media presence, including creating engaging content, scheduling posts, and interacting with followers Create high-quality content (e.g., blog posts, articles, infographics) to attract and engage target audiences Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify opportunities and develop effective marketing strategies Manage marketing budget and track campaign performance using analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics) Assist with website maintenance and optimization Support with public relations activities (e.g., press releases, media outreach) Collaborate with other departments, such as sales and product development, to ensure alignment with marketing goals Qualifications:  Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field (preferred) 1-3 years of experience in marketing or a relevant field Strong understanding of digital marketing principles and best practices Excellent written and verbal communication skills Proven ability to create compelling and engaging content Experience with social media marketing platforms (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, Twitter) Familiarity with content management systems (CMS) a plus Experience with marketing automation tools a plus Data-driven and analytical mindset Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks simultaneously Strong organizational skills and attention to detail Team player with a positive and collaborative attitude Benefits:  Competitive salary and benefits package Opportunity to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment Be part of a growing and innovative company Gain valuable experience in the tech industry To Apply:  Please submit your resume and cover letter to [email protected]  We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

Jane Doe 123 Main Street | Anytown, CA 12345 | 555-555-5555 | jane.doe@email.com  Summary  Enthusiastic and creative marketing intern with a passion for technology and a strong understanding of digital marketing principles. Eager to learn and contribute to the success of a fast-paced tech company.  Skills  Social media marketing Content marketing Email marketing Search engine optimization (SEO) Google Analytics Adobe Creative Suite Experience  Marketing Intern Acme Tech | Anytown, CA June 2023 - August 2023  Developed and executed social media campaigns that increased brand awareness by 20% Created engaging content for the company blog and website Managed email marketing campaigns that resulted in a 15% increase in conversion rates Assisted with SEO efforts that improved website traffic by 10% Contributed to the development of marketing materials and presentations Education  Bachelor of Arts in Marketing Anytown University | Anytown, CA Expected Graduation: May 2024  Relevant Coursework:  Digital Marketing Social Media Marketing Content Marketing Search Engine Optimization (SEO) Marketing Analytics Projects  Developed a social media marketing plan for a local restaurant that resulted in a 30% increase in followers Created a content marketing campaign for a small business that generated 100 new leads Managed an email marketing campaign for a non-profit organization that raised $5,000 Awards and Honors  Dean's List Marketing Club President Social Media Marketing Scholarship

number_of_questions.title: Number of questions
number_of_questions.description: How many questions you would like to do. Maximum of 10 questions.

role_of_interviewer.title: Role of the interviewer
role_of_interviewer.description: The role of the interviewer (e.g., director of product); if provided act as that role
